biography: Eva is an expert in the systems that keep modern cities alive. Specializing in Urban Mobility and Smart City technology, she sees cities not as collections of buildings, but as complex, dynamic organisms that can be optimized for efficiency and sustainability. She is a pragmatic and data-driven planner, always seeking the most efficient route, whether on her bicycle or in a complex logistics problem. Her work aims to create smarter, greener, and more livable urban environments.
